name: Fishin' Ain't Easy
description:
Fishin' Aint Easy 

I had spare time between an internship ending and school starting so I decided I wanted to make a fishing game. It's inspired by early flash games I played on Newgrounds and the "Mister Meaty" deep fryer game.

Consider donating!

Keep our waterways clean and healthy! Consider donating to one of the charities listed below! Even if you can't donate try cleaning up your local fishing spot, every little bit helps!

  • The National Fish and Wildlife Foundation
  • Texas Parks & Wildlife Foundation
  • Ocean Conservancy
